text: Veetuku Oru Kannagi (lit. Kannagi for every home) is a 1984 Indian Tamil drama film, directed and produced by S. A. Chandrasekhar. The film stars Vijayakanth, Sujatha, Nalini and Sangili Murugan in lead roles. The film had musical score by Shankar Ganesh. ==Cast== *Vijayakanth *Sujatha *Nalini *Sangili Murugan *Y. G. Mahendran *Raveendar *Sathyakala *Ilavarasi *Venniradai Moorthy *Typist Gopu *Raja *Pasi Sathya *Vani *Baby Setha *Ashadevi *Jayamalini *Anuradha *Jaishankar ==Soundtrack== Soundtrack was composed by Shankar Ganesh. *Nee Venmalligai-Vani Jairam & S.N. Surendar *Kallallada Mannallada-P Susheela *Then Paandi-Vani Jayaram, SN Surender *Raatthiri Dhinam-Shobha Sekhar ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1984 films Category:Indian films Category:1980s Tamil-language films Category:Films scored by Sankar Ganesh Category:Films directed by S. A. Chandrasekhar
title: Veetuku Oru Kannagi
